column4: hey guys, i just put up a new Hard Drive, and when I click on properties it tells me 38.8 GB is used (out of 687.7 total, although it's a 750 GB hard drive)?
hey guys, i just put up a new Hard Drive, and when I click on properties it tells me 38.8 GB is used (out of 687.7 total, although it's a 750 GB hard drive). Is this normal?
38.8 seems like an awful lot of space thats being used when it should be empty in the first place
